roleset.name: portend

example.name: they all look more or less like this
example.text: Still, AMR's stumble doesn't bode well for the rest of the industry.
example.arg: for the rest of the industry

roleset.note: I think this might be the first real adverbial argument we've had.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'bode' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. This is almost a fixed phrase.
